getting married

By Krister Axel on 01/29 2009 at 22_24 in Historical

Just so y'all know, I'm getting married soon.

End of June actually.

So of course, I have a wedding album to make which will contain some new songs and some unreleased old songs. I don't have a name for it yet, but it is going to be awesome.

To go along with that, I have a show coming up in April again at the Santa Monica Farmer's market and then that will probably be it for a while. 5 albums in 6 years means I get to take a break. :)

And I could use some more comments in the Apple Store, so thanks for your support!

iTunes store (note - the Axel catalog was reset in 2010 and all of the album comments were lost)

krister

added - tentative track list:

Sweet Thing
When They Come To Take Me In
Keep Me Here
Mona Lisa
Sunshine
Still Feels Broken
Georgia On My Mind
